titles.title: A Mighty Fortress Is Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A mighty fortress is our God, newline A bulwark never failing, newline A bulwark never failing, newline Bulwark never failing, newline A bulwark never failing, newline A bulwark never failing, newline A bulwark never failing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our helper He amid the, newline Flood our helper He, newline Our helper amid the flood, newline Of mortal ills prevailing, newline Mid mortal ills prevailing,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For still our ancient foe, newline For still our ancient foe, newline Doth seek for us woe, newline Doth seek for us woe, newline With craft and great might, newline With craft and great might,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Armed with cruel hate, newline And armed with cruel hate, newline And armed with cruel hate, newline On earth is none His equal, newline On earth is none equal.
